summary: Customer support professional with versatile communication skills, experienced in sales, problem resolution, ticketing, and client management. Adaptive and able to work independently or with teams, with leadership experience overseeing a team. Skilled at handling multiple priorities in fast-paced environments. Knowledgeable about airport security rules and airline software (Amadeus, Altea, Gaetan, Oscar, Deltamatic) and proficient with computers and technology. Fluent in Spanish and English, with French as a proficient language.
skills: Airline software: Amadeus, Altea, Gaetan, Oscar, Deltamatic

experience.title: Passenger Service Agent
experience.description: Lead agent on departure and arrivals; skilled in flight monitoring and ticket sales; handle passengers during flight disruptions; provide customer service assistance including re-booking and hotel vouchers; maintain customer satisfaction; help the team work smoothly with an action plan; implement company policy and security requirements; manage check-in baggage; direct passengers to designated areas; assist passengers with special needs; shadow and oversee newly trained agents as a senior lead agent.

experience.title: Assistant Buyer
experience.description: Performed multifaceted clerical tasks (data entry, filing, records management, billing); coordinated events; monitored the buyer's weekly schedule; placed orders and monitored inventory databases; supervised two staff; liaised with warehouse and vendors; communicated across departments; resolved errors and contributed to store distribution decisions.

experience.title: Sales Associate Supervisor
experience.description: Trained and directed staff to operate cash registers, scanners, and computers; managed store restocking, floor displays, and daily procedures; balanced cash registers; greeted clients, explained promotions, and encouraged purchases; guided cashiers through returns and exchanges; opened and closed the store on weekends; promoted to corporate office position (as noted in the CV).
